items.title: Porter Talk #6: Porters and the Making of Modern Canada
items.author: Discover Library and Archives Canada
items.content: In the final episode of Porter Talk, we dive into how union gains paved the way for a brighter future for Black communities in Canada. This fight for basic human rights significantly contributed to a stronger and more progressive Canada for all. (Episode 6) Transcript

items.title: Porter Talk: Episode 6 Trailer
items.author: Discover Library and Archives Canada
items.content: In the final episode of Porter Talk, we dive into how union gains paved the way for a brighter future for Black communities in Canada. This fight for basic human rights significantly contributed to a stronger and more progressive Canada for all. (Episode 6 trailer)TranscriptNarrator Biographies

items.title: Porter Talk #5: The Women Who Stood With Porters
items.author: Discover Library and Archives Canada
items.content: Join us as we meet some of the strong and devoted women who stood with porters. Without their commitment and persistence, union gains would not have been possible in light of the men’s absence while working on the rails. (Episode 5) Transcript

items.title: Porter Talk: Episode 5 Trailer
items.author: Discover Library and Archives Canada
